detailsDescription.after: to naming: your e-services will be easier to find and clearer in their goals

eserviceDescriptionField.label: E-service description
eserviceDescriptionField.infoLabel: Include input and output data in the description. Min 10 chars, max 250 chars

eserviceAudienceDescriptionField.label: A chi è rivolto il template?

eserviceTechnologyField.label: What technology is your API built with?

eserviceModeField.label: Does the e-service deliver or receive data?

isSignalHubSuggested.label: Suggerisco all’implementatore di segnalare su Signal Hub le variazioni dei dati

infoLabel.before: Signal Hub utilizza il servizio di push
infoLabel.after: per generare notifiche relative alle variazioni dei dati relativi all’e-service.

step1.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfo: The contents of this step will no longer be editable after the first version of this e-service is published

stepPurpose.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfoAlert: The contents of this step will no longer be editable after the publication of the first version of the e-service

purposeTableSection.title: Purpose
purposeTableSection.description: Indicate the use cases for which you intend to collect data. For each purpose you will need to complete a risk analysis.
purposeTableSection.noSelectedPurposesTooltip: You must indicate at least one purpose to continue

riskAnalysisNameSection.title: Purpose
riskAnalysisNameSection.description: Indicate a use case for which you intend to collect data and complete the risk analysis.

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk analysis
riskAnalysisSection.description: The questions in the questionnaire will vary based on the answers provided gradually. If you change the answer to a previous question, subsequent questions may change.
riskAnalysisSection.personalDataAlert: Be careful not to enter personal data in the free text fields

audienceField.label: Audience
audienceField.infoLabel: Represents the recipient of the voucher, i.e. your target resource. Doubts? <1>Read the guide</1>

thresholdSection.title: Threshold of calls expected for consumers

validation.min: This value cannot be below the threshold set for the API calls/day for each subscriber

agreementApprovalPolicySection.title: Do you want to manually activate all the fruition requests received?
agreementApprovalPolicySection.label: Yes, I will activate them manually

step3.attributesDescription: Please point out all the certified, verified and declared attributes that the provider must have in order to create an agreement for the e-service

createAttributeDrawer.subtitle: Una volta creato, troverai l’attributo nella lista tra quelli disponibili per essere aggiunti ad un e-service

description.rest: Upload the OpenAPI file that descrives the API. You must ensure that your specification meets the requirements set in the ModI framework. To check, use
description.soap: Upload the WSDL file that descrives the API

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Upload the technical documents that can help implement the use of this e-service

isSignalHubEnabled.label: Is available the data update system (Signal Hub)?

notPublishableTooltip.label: Uno o più campi richiesti non sono stati compilati. Completa la bozza

rejectedDelegatedVersionDraftAlert.delegate: The publication of this draft was rejected by the delegator. <1>Read the reasons for rejection</1> and resend the draft with the corrections.
rejectedDelegatedVersionDraftAlert.delegator: You have reject the publication of this draft. <1>Read the reasons for rejection here</1>.
